entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 10:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -12.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -14.3°C
Wind: SW 24 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending overnight then flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow in the morning. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
